mean_en: the size or measurement of something from one end to the other; the amount of time that something lasts; the distance from one end of a swimming pool to the other; the size of a horse or boat from one end to the other, when it is used to measure the distance between two horses or boats taking part in a race
sentence: The ruler is 15 cm in length.
word_etyma: leng长 + th名词后缀 → length长度
